biotools.summary: Estimates error model parameters from replicated, preprocessed experiments, and  uses error model to improve the accuracy of the expression ratio and to assign a value ‘lambda’ to each gene, indicating the likelihood that the gene is differentially expressed.

bioschemas.name: VERA   SAM
bioschemas.summary: Estimates error model parameters from replicated, preprocessed experiments, and  uses error model to improve the accuracy of the expression ratio and to assign a value ‘lambda’ to each gene, indicating the likelihood that the gene is differentially expressed.
